Clipboard Cleaner is here to prevent your clipboard from being used casually, secure your copied password & defend your privacy!
Create a service running in the background. Reset your clipboard if it\'s changed or notify you. This solution is efficient but battery-draining.
Report me if the clipboard\'s changed.
Create widgets on your home screen. Click them to reset clipboard or see clipboard content. \n\nYou can find them in the widget list.
Create an app shortcut on your home screen. Click them to reset clipboard or see clipboard content.
Permission granted! Please create shortcuts now.

If enabled, will only clean the content that includes keywords.
Add a quick setting tile to your notification bar. Click them to reset clipboard or see clipboard content. \n\nYou can find them in the quick settings edit screen.

Start scan and choose invalid media files you want to remove.

Steps:
1. Click "Start scan!" button and wait for finishing scanning.
2. Choose actually invalid media files and click "Clean." button.
3. Done! You can go now XD
